select o.id id, o.no no, o.order_date orderDate, o.client_id clientId, o.addr addr, o.goods_id goodsId, o.count count, o.weight weight, o.volume volume, o.freight_monthly freightMonthly, o.freight_now freightNow, o.freight_arrive freightArrive, o.cost_freight costFreight, o.cost_direct costDirect, o.cost_insurance costInsurance, o.transfer_company_id transferCompanyId, o.transfer_no transferNo, o.receipt receipt, o.remark remark, o.create_date createDate, o.modify_date modifyDate, o.commission commission, c.name clientName, tc.name transferCompanyName, g.name goodsName, s.name salesmanName from t_order o LEFT JOIN t_client c ON client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_transfer_company tc ON transfer_company_id = tc.id LEFT JOIN t_goods g ON goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN t_salesman s ON s.id = o.salesman_id
order by ${orderByClause}
